trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] When a service that derives from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> class encounters an exception that it cannot handle, it can call the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A> method to tell the workflow runtime engine to raise the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]當衍生自服務<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>類別在遇到無法處理的例外狀況，它可以呼叫<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A>方法來指示工作流程執行階段引擎引發<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName>事件。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>

trans-unit.source: The service passes the <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance and the <xref:System.Exception> associated with this event in its call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 服務則傳遞<xref:System.Guid>工作流程執行個體和<xref:System.Exception><xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A>的呼叫中這個事件相關聯</xref:System.Exception>的</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime engine encapsulates these parameters in a ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs and raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程執行階段引擎中封裝這些參數 ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs 並引發<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName>事件。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: From inside of a subscriber to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName> event, you can read the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> property and the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.Exception%2A> property to get the information associated with a particular <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: 從訂閱者內<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName>事件，您可以閱讀<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.WorkflowInstanceId%2A>屬性和<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.Exception%2A>屬性來取得具有特定相關聯的資訊<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName>事件。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.Exception%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception that could not be handled by the service.
trans-unit.target: 取得服務無法處理的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Exception> that represents the exception that could not be handled by the service.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Exception>表示服務無法處理的例外狀況。</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance associated with the unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.Guid>與未處理的例外狀況相關聯的工作流程執行個體。</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: WorkflowInstanceId is equivalent to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.InstanceId%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of the workflow instance associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled> event.
trans-unit.target: WorkflowInstanceId 相當於<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.InstanceId%2A?displayProperty=fullName>與相關聯的工作流程執行個體<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled>事件。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.InstanceId%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance associated with the unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Guid>與未處理的例外狀況相關聯的工作流程執行個體。</xref:System.Guid>
